Keygen is screwed, and my damn original has way too much Starforce protection to run on a dual core windows 7 64bit. So Don't worry all, I hope the hell I help someone else that's struggled so much finding a serial for a "cracked" install. So this is my original game serial for you. HA! The finger to Techland and their starforce crap! Enjoy!
XR-WFP97-RXPXY-KK9P9-RRA4T-TXPEK -> original XR Xpand Rally #
XRX-F3TPE-XYAKY-ECKF3-ATFWK-R7WEC -> XR Xpand Rally Xtreme #

Thanks alot. works fine, no virus. just follow the instructions.
